name: Retro Village
description:
Pretty simple city sim/builder that I've been putting together. Putting this page up mostly to share the demo with friends, but others can certainly feel free to enjoy it.

Only one save file can be loaded at a time, sadly. So starting a new game wipes an old game.

Move Camera with WASD. Place houses to increase workers, farms for food, mines for ores, log cabin for wood, etc. Power Lines will extend range of playable area.

Lol, have fun
